Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line expressing UCHL1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 40% for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type UCHL1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 70% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using transgenic mice with UCHL1 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Neuronal degeneration was observed in transgenic mice expressing the variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mice were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Neuronal degeneration observed in â‰¥ 50% of mice.
